name: meangirls
author: Tor Hagemann <tor.hagemann@gmail.com>
description: JavaScript re-implementation of Aphyr's gem for CRDTs

scripts.test: npm run coverage -- --reporter text mocha --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=docs,reportFilename=index
scripts.test:jenkins: npm run coverage -- --reporter html --report-dir test/coverage mocha --reporter xunit --reporter-options output=test/report.xml
